name: ii
caption: Holding cost rate (%)
message: The holding cost rate must be expressed as a percentage

name: type
caption: Type of resource constraint(s)
default_value: Budget|;Turnover ratio|;No.Orders / Setups|;Storage Space|;setup capacity|;Space & Budget|;Space & Turnover|
message: Select a resource constraint type from the list

name: RHS1
caption: Right-hand-side of constraint 1
message: The right-hand side for constraint 1 must be positive

name: RHS2
caption: Right-hand-side of constraint 2
message: Leave the default value in case of a single constraint problem

name: dd
caption: Demand rate
message: Demand rate must be strictly positive. Use the same time unit as the production rate.

name: pp
caption: Production rate
message: Leave the default value in case of infinite production. Use the time unit of the demand rate

name: order
caption: Ordering/Setup
message: The setup/ordering cost must be strictly positive

name: cc
caption: Unit cost
message: Unit procurement cost must be strictly positive.

name: pipi
caption: Backorder cost
message: Leave the default value in case backorders are disallowed

name: coef1
caption: Coef Constraint 1
message: The coefficients for constraint 1 must be strictly poistive
